DOC.brief_summary: Autologous platelet concentrate will enhance the rate of healing of chronic diabetic wounds
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Platelet Concentrate in Treatment of Diabetic Ulcers
DOC.detailed_description: The treatment of a diabetic wound with APC and thrombinhas the potential to accelerate the re-epithial process when compared with usual care. The study is a prospective, randomized, blinded, multicenter clinical evaluation.
DOC.criteria: chronic diabetic ulcer steroids, dialysis, vascular disease
